remarks: Lemma for ~ ismblfin , effectively one direction of the same fact for open sets, made necessary by Viaclovsky's slightly different defintion of outer measure.  Note that unlike the main theorem, this holds for sets of infinite measure.  (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 21-Feb-2018.) (Revised by Brendan Leahy, 13-Jul-2018.)

$d A s $.
$d M s $.
